basics.label: Air Traffic Controller
basics.summary: Retired Air Traffic Controller with more than 32 years of experience working traffic in the En Route Environment. Performed OJTI, CIC and ERAM SME duties, specializing ERAM automaton.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: While working more than 32 years as an En Route Air Traffic Controller (ATCS) in the En Route environment, I maintained the safe, orderly, and expeditious flow of air traffic in the NAS.
highlights: I was a member of the Independent Operational Assessment (IOA) team that performed a comprehensive Analysis of the ERAM upgrade to the National Air Space System (NAS).
I worked daily military training flights on IR and VR routes, airspace reservation both moving ALTRAV and special Use airspace (SUA).

skills.name: Air Traffic Control
keywords: Certified En Route Air Traffic control experience
Strong understanding of ATC Automation processes
Strong understanding of ATC rules and procedures
Expert vectoring and speed control skills
